content: **dream catcher cardi - crochet shrug ** ======================================= the dream catcher cardi is a chunky crochet shrug with a gorgeous diamond motif on the back **shrug sizing & fit** this oversized crochet cardigan pattern is written for 4 sizes - xs/s m/l xl/2x and 3x/4x/5x the cardigan is very loose fitting if you would like a more classic fit you may consider a smaller size **pdf pattern includes ** * 34-page ad-free print-friendly pdf for you to print at home * video tutorials * crochet pattern written for 4 sizes xs/s m/l xl/2x 3x/4x * detailed crochet stitch charts for all sections * schematic and step by step photos * instructions for adjusting length and width * tips for making the pattern with different yarn weights **materials** **yarn ** any #5/bulky weight yarn * paintbox yarns simply chunky 1 * 100% acrylic * * hobbii fluffy day xl 2 * 100% premium acrylic * * wecrochet wonderfluff 3 * 70% baby alpaca 7% merino wool 23% nylon * * wecrochet brava bulky 4 * 100% premium acrylic * * lion brand hue & me 5 * 80% acrylic 20% wool * **hook ** 6 5mm k-10 5 crochet hook 6 or hook required to meet gauge --- **join my newsletter **
